movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Interstellar 2
movies.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.synopsis: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.synopsis: A lion cub prince is cast out of his pride and leaves his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.synopsis: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.synopsis: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry, each trying to best the other with their latest illusions.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.synopsis: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.synopsis: Eight years after the Joker's reign of terror, Batman is forced to come out of retirement when a masked vigilante, Bane, threatens Gotham City.

movies.title: Magadheera
movies.synopsis: A warrior reincarnates to save his love from an ancient curse.

movies.title: Geetha Govindam
movies.synopsis: A lecturer tries to win over a woman after their relationship begins awkwardly.

movies.title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
movies.synopsis: A man discovers he was swapped at birth with another family.

movies.title: Drushyam
movies.synopsis: A cable operator fabricates an alibi to protect his family from a murder investigation.

movies.title: RRR
movies.synopsis: Two revolutionaries join forces to fight against British colonial rule.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movies.synopsis: An orphaned man learns about his royal lineage and his quest to reclaim his throne.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Conclusion
movies.synopsis: The story of Mahendra Baahubali's battle to reclaim his father's kingdom.

movies.title: Arjun Reddy
movies.synopsis: A surgeon's self-destructive path after a breakup.

movies.title: Pushpa: The Rise
movies.synopsis: A laborer rises through the ranks of the red sandalwood smuggling business.

movies.title: Eega
movies.synopsis: A man reincarnates as a fly to seek revenge on his murderer.

movies.title: Jersey
movies.synopsis: A cricketer makes a comeback to fulfill his son's wish.

movies.title: Srimanthudu
movies.synopsis: A wealthy businessman adopts a village to develop it and finds purpose in life.

movies.title: Attarintiki Daredi
movies.synopsis: A man tries to reunite his estranged family by resolving long-standing conflicts.

movies.title: Sye
movies.synopsis: Two rival college groups unite to save their campus from a powerful landlord through a rugby match.

movies.title: Rangasthalam
movies.synopsis: A hearing-impaired man stands up against corruption in his village.

movies.title: Ala Modalaindi
movies.synopsis: A love story filled with unexpected twists and coincidences.

movies.title: Vedam
movies.synopsis: Five lives converge in a gripping tale of love, sacrifice, and redemption.

movies.title: Khaleja
movies.synopsis: A taxi driver discovers he is destined to save a village plagued by a mysterious disease.

movies.title: Businessman
movies.synopsis: A man with a mysterious past sets out to establish himself as a powerful mafia leader in Mumbai.

movies.title: Ye Maaya Chesave
movies.synopsis: A filmmaker falls for a girl with family restrictions and tries to win her love.

movies.title: Evaru
movies.synopsis: A corrupt cop unravels a complex web of lies while investigating a murder.

movies.title: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
movies.synopsis: A small-town detective uncovers a big conspiracy while investigating a case.

movies.title: Geetanjali
movies.synopsis: A terminally ill man falls in love, but fate has its own plans.

movies.title: Guntur Kaaram
movies.synopsis: A high-octane action drama set against the backdrop of Guntur's vibrant culture.
